term.title: standard molality

item.text: Chosen value of molality and usually equal to 1 mol kg-1.

sources.item: PAC, 1994, 66, 533. 'Standard quantities in chemical thermodynamics. Fugacities, activities and equilibrium constants for pure and mixed phases (IUPAC Recommendations 1994)' on page 538 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199466030533)
